column5: Does anyone know the ice conditions in the inland Parry Sound area ? Might be heading up that way this weekend for a bit of late ice fishing but i'm not too sure. Looks like the Muskoka lakes still have lots of ice so it should be okay a little more north I would think ! Thanks
Anything north of the Muskoka lakes will be fine for this weekend.

There was 20" of ice (clear + a few inches of white) in the area where we were fishing last weekend.  Temps are staying cold for Parry Sound, so I will hopefully be heading up myself this weekend again.  Have a good one!
Was just east of parry sound last weekend.  Ice was 20" and shoreline tight.  I would say good to go.  Good luck!!
